message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICE_PLAN_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Service Plan ID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_MEMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: Case member must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASESTATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: A service plan cannot be created for an integrated case that is closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_SP_TYPES_LIST_EMPTY
message.locale: The service plan cannot be created as the integrated case must be associated with a service plan type.

message.name: ERR_FV_SP_NO_IC_ASSOCIATION
message.locale: There are no service plans associated with this product delivery. Please contact the administrator.

message.name: ERR_FV_SP_TYPES_LIST_EMPTY_SPG_LINKED
message.locale: There are no Service Plans you can select because they are all configured to be created within a Service Plan Group.

message.name: ERR_FV_TEMPLATE_LIST_EMPTY
message.locale: No templates have been defined for the selected service plan type. Please select the Cancel button to open the service plan home page.

message.name: ERR_FV_PLAN_TEMPLATE_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Template must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to create a service plan.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to create a service plan for this client.

message.name: ERR_CASE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to list service plans for the selected case.

message.name: ERR_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to list service plans for the selected client.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_LIST_PLAN_PARTICIPANTS_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_NOMINATED_REPRESENTATIVE_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAIN_NOMREP_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to add a nominated representative.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_NOMREP_WHEN_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: A nominated representative may not be added to a service plan with a status of Closed.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_NOMREP_NOT_PLAN_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The plan participant may not be specified as a nominated representative.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_NOMREP_SELECT_ONLY_ONE_REPRESENTATIVE
message.locale: You must specify a value for one of the Participant, Registered Person or Representative Name fields.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_NOMREP_START_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The start date cannot be earlier than the current date.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAIN_NOMREP_DUPLICATE_PERSON
message.locale: This person has already been specified as a nominated representative for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_START_NOT_EARLIER_THAN_ORIGINAL_START
message.locale: The start date cannot be earlier than the start date already specified for this nominated representative.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_START_EARLIER_THAN_END
message.locale: The start date must be earlier than the end date.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_WHEN_CONTRACT_ISSUED
message.locale: A contract has been issued to this nominated representative that has not yet been returned. An end date may not be specified for this nominated representative until the contract has been received by the organization or canceled.

A contract has been issued to this nominated representative that has not yet been returned. An end date may not be specified for this nominated representative until the contract has been received by the organisation or cancelled.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_WHEN_DELETED
message.locale: This nominated representative has been canceled and cannot be modified.
This nominated representative has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_NOMREP_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must specify nominated representative start date

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to modify this service plan.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_NOMREP_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to delete this nominated representative.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NOMREP_END_LATER_THAN_CONTRACT_DATE
message.locale: The end date must be later than the latest date, "%1d", a contract issued to this nominated representative was either returned or canceled.
The end date must be later than the latest date, "%1d", a contract issued to this nominated representative was either returned or cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_NOMREP_WHEN_CONTRACT_ISSUED
message.locale: This nominated representative may not be deleted as a contract has already been issued to this person.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_NOMREP_WHEN_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: This nominated representative may not be deleted as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_NOMREP_WHEN_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This nominated representative has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_LIST_VERSIONS_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_CLOSURE_REASON_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Close reason code must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CLOSE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to close this service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_PLAN_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: The service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_NO_CLOSURE_DETAILS_FOUND
message.locale: There are no closure details for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_CLOSURE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to modify this service plan details.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_CLOSURE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view service plan closure details.

message.name: ERR_CLONE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to clone this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CLONE_STATUS_FAILED
message.locale: A service plan must be Active or Closed before it can be cloned.

message.name: ERR_CLONE_CONTRACT_UNACCEPTED_FAILED
message.locale: A service plan cannot be cloned until a contract has been accepted by the client in respect of the plan.

message.name: INF_CLOSE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Service Plan reference number %1s has been closed.

message.name: INF_CLOSE_REASON
message.locale: Service Plan reference number %3s, for participant %4s, has been closed on %1s by user %2s. Please proceed to the case home page to review the details of this Service Plan.

message.name: INF_CLONE_SUBJECT
message.locale: This Service Plan has been cloned.

message.name: INF_CLONE_REASON
message.locale: This service plan has been cloned on %1s. New Service Plan %2s has been created. Cloned Service Plan %3s has been closed.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_OUTCOME_NOT_SET
message.locale: The service plan may not be closed as an outcome has not been defined for the service plan goal.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan for this client.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_TYPE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan type.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_TYPE_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan type for this client.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_GOAL_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan goal.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_GOAL_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify the service plan goal for this client.

message.name: ERR_SP_DELIVERY_FV_PRODUCT_UNDEFINED
message.locale: Associated product delivery cannot be created as appropriate product type does not exist

message.name: ERR_SP_DELIVERY_FV_PROVIDER_UNDEFINED
message.locale: Associated product delivery cannot be created as product provider is undefined

message.name: ERR_SP_DELIVERY_FV_DELIVERY_PATTERN_UNDEFINED
message.locale: Associated product delivery cannot be created as delivery pattern is undefined

message.name: ERR_SP_DELIVERY_PROSPECT_PERSON
message.locale: A Service Plan cannot be created for a Prospect Person. Please register the Prospect Person as a Person.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICEPLAN_PRIMARY_HAS_TO_BE_PLANNED_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The primary plan participant must be selected as a plan participant.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICEPLAN_PRIMARY_IS_NOT_PLANNED_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The primary plan participant must be selected as a plan participant.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICEPLAN_PLANPARTICIPANT_NOT_MODIFIABLE
message.locale: Plan participants cannot be added or removed from a service plan once the status becomes "Active".

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICEPLAN_PLANPARTICIPANT_NOT_REMOVABLE
message.locale: Plan participants cannot be removed once they are associated with any plan item.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICEPLAN_PLANPARTICIPANT_NOT_MODIFIABLE
message.locale: Plan participants cannot be added or removed from a service plan once the status becomes %1c.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_UPDATE_CLOSURE_DETAILS
message.locale: Closure details for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s have been updated by %4s.
